locale.message: Integrate OJS with ClamAV for uploaded submission files. Through this plugin, OJS can scan each submission file at the time of upload, and will reject files which have virus signatures known to ClamAV.
Clam Antivirus blocked the uploaded file due to the virus signature "{$virusFound}" in file "{$fileName}".
Please provide detail on how to execute Clam AV on your system. You must already have Clam AV installed.
The system path to Clam AV's clamscan executable.
The system path to Clam AV's clamscan executable is required.

If the clamd daemon is available on your system, you can use it to scan uploaded files instead of the clamscan executable. Unlike clamscan, the clamd daemon keeps its virus definitions in memory between scans, reducing latency.
Connect to the ClamAV Daemon instead?
The system path to Clam AV's clamd.sock socket.
